message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. Hope you agree!
Your turn Alice. How about something more realistic? 60/40 split?
Okay, I'll take your suggestion of a 60/40 split, but with the roles reversed.  Let's see if you're as willing to budge as you suggested!
This is getting us nowhere. Let's meet in the middle. 55/45?
